ErrorCode.name: ControlInternalException
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Internal Exception in Control during creation of the array.
ErrorCode.description: Internal Exception in Control during creation of the array.

ErrorCode.name: ArrayNotFoundException
ErrorCode.shortDescription: Array doesn't exist. It could be destroyed, or it was never was created.
ErrorCode.description: Array doesn't exist. It could be destroyed, or it was never was created.
